text:
On "Enoshima", an isolated island
floating east of Orient City.

In the small, cozy village office built on the tiny island,
the intercom rang, announcing a visitor.

name: Friendly Office Staff?
text:
Ohh~!
If it isn't you, Tatsumi-kun!
What brings you here today?

name: Saotome
text:
If you have any troubles,
don't hesitate to consult me!
This Saotome will solve them in a flash—

name: Islander
text:
Um...
Actually, this...

What Tatsumi, the islander, offered hesitantly was a moving-out notice—
Documents for moving away from Enoshima.

name: Islander
text:
Actually, I've been thinking about it for a while.
I thought it might be better for my child to live outside Enoshima.

name: Islander
text:
I'm sorry for the sudden notice.
Saotome-san, you've always been so kind to me...

name: Saotome
text:
No, no, you don't have to apologize!
This must be the conclusion you reached
after thinking hard for your precious son, right?

name: Saotome
text:
Don't worry about me,
just live happily wherever you move!
And then—

Someday, I want you to come visit Enoshima again.
I want you to remember this island.

Swallowing the words that were about to come out,
Saotome instead put on a smile.

name: Saotome
text:
—And then,
say hello to your wife and son for me!

After finishing a day's work,
Saotome headed home.

name: Saotome
text:
Is this the third time this year?
That I've processed moving-out papers
for someone leaving this island...

Friends from childhood.
Comrades who worked side-by-side at the village office.

Familiar people are gradually leaving the island.
Familiar places are becoming more and more desolate.

At this rate,
the hometown, filled with precious memories,
will be swallowed by the waves of time.

He had tried every possible measure to prevent that,
but had not achieved any significant results.

name: Saotome
text:
...No.
Complaining won't get me anywhere.
I must do what I can.

name: Saotome
text:
Let's see...
First, I'll prepare dinner.
An empty stomach won't do.

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto must be back from school,
and hungry too.
Tonight, I'll make something delicious...

When Saotome, who had just muttered to himself,
entered the entrance of his home—

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Dad!
It's incredible!!

A loud voice from Yuto,
Saotome's son greeted him.

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto?!
W-what's wrong?!
Why are you in such a hurry!

name: Yuto
text:
What's wrong, you asked?! Our "project"
is growing at an incredible pace!

name: Yuto
text:
Look, look!
The support money is amazing!
There are so many 0s!!

Urged by Yuto,
Saotome peered at the screen,
and his eyes widened in astonishment.

name: Saotome
text:
An, an incredible amount
has been gathered—!?

—And a few days later.
In Orient City, where the summer heat was gradually increasing.

[Player] was diligently working at their desk
in the Parallel Flight Inc. office.

options.text: Summer is getting closer and closer, huh?
I'll turn up the air conditioner a bit more.

name: Monomasa
text:
...[Player].
I bought canned coffee.
Let's take a short break.

name: Melide
text:
I agree.
[Player]-san has been sitting at their desk
since morning.

name: Melide
text:
Since it's this hot,
I don't think it's wrong to take a little break.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not really.
Today, I just had remote school classes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...But, I've also become able to help with work quite easily now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I think this is also thanks to you teaching me various tips, [Player]-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't worry about it.
I was just about to take a break myself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That's half an excuse, though.
I just felt like talking to you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...What's wrong, [Player]?
Why do you look so surprised?

text:
While drinking canned coffee with Melide and Monomasa,
[Player] looked around the office.

And [Player] noticed that most of the members
who usually sat at their desks were absent.

options.text: I thought it was strangely quiet...
Akashi, Sui, and Mokdai are all gone...
What was everyone's schedule like again?

name: Monomasa
text:
Akashi and the others are probably
in the middle of a hero show
right now.

name: Melide
text:
There are so many event articles in magazines.
It seems hero shows are really being held
in various places this time of year.

name: Monomasa
text:
Especially for Justice,
requests for appearances were pouring in
from stages and leisure facilities nationwide.

name: Melide
text:
I thought I knew, but
he's surprisingly popular.
Was it three places today?

name: Monomasa
text:
Although it's due to Justice's popularity,
it's still pleasing as a colleague that Akashi and the others
have started getting offers too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
After the work in Aguarica, he's gradually improving.
You don't need to worry excessively.

options.text: Mokdai's acting is quite good, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe. Mokdai-oniichan knows a lot about hero shows.
Perhaps he's making use of his knowledge.

options.text: Sui's graceful string techniques have a good reputation!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes. The other day, I went with Sui-chan to her work, and she's getting better and better.
I was captivated.

text:
As they took a break with Melide and Monomasa
and chatted idly—

Huckle, looking a bit tired, appeared from the
conference room at the back of the office.

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm...
What should I do...?

options.text: Oh, right, you were in a meeting...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun?
I haven't said anything yet...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Rather, casual conversation is welcome.
To make the office a comfortable place to work, fostering a harmonious atmosphere is also essential.

name: Melide
text:
...Huckle-san.
Were you in the conference room this whole time?
That was a very long meeting.

name: Monomasa
text:
—You're frowning.
Was it such a troublesome matter?
If there's anything I can help with, I will.

Receiving words from Melide, Monomasa,
and [Player], Huckle opened his mouth.

name: Huckle
text:
Thank you for your concern.
I'd like to say it's not necessary, but
it's also true that I'm a bit troubled.

name: Huckle
text:
...Right.
You have different connections than I do.
It would be helpful if you could lend your strength in that area.

name: Huckle
text:
—So, a request for cooperation in village
revitalization has arrived from Enoshima,
an isolated island floating east of Orient City.

name: Monomasa
text:
East of Orient City...
Towards the South Kanto region?

name: Melide
text:
I'm not very familiar with that area, but...
Are there really inhabited islands there?

name: Huckle
text:
Yes. It's a very small inhabited island,
so its notoriety is low. It's located just before
the Boso Peninsula, where Chiba is.

name: Huckle
text:
Among the areas near South Kanto,
the damage from monsters was minor, and
it once gained fame as an observation base—

name: Huckle
text:
Now, its role has ended, and it seems to be
a peaceful island where descendants of the residents
of that time quietly live.

name: Huckle
text:
I believe a train used to pass through Enoshima,
bypassing South Kanto.
I'll confirm it later.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh...?
As far as I know, Enoshima has always been an isolated island...

name: Huckle
text:
Ahem, let's get back to the main topic.
This request is for a crowdfunding project
for village revitalization.

name: Huckle
text:
They seem to need an on-site Operator and
a hero, but the required conditions are a bit special.

name: Melide
text:
—A hero who operates mainly on Earth,
and can secure a solid schedule, I believe.

name: Monomasa
text:
Hmm... The conditions are certainly strict.
Wouldn't it be difficult to dispatch someone
from this company?

name: Huckle
text:
Their preference was Ryekie, but
his schedule is already packed
with hero show appearances.

name: Melide
text:
Akashi-oniichan has a summer tournament, and
it might be impossible for everyone else to go
for several days at once.

name: Monomasa
text:
Village revitalization... work to liven up the area.
It's probably unsuitable for me or Yoshiori.
We always keep our distance from lively places.

name: Huckle
text:
That's why I consulted you.
I thought you might have someone in mind
who meets the conditions.

name: Huckle
text:
Even if we can't accept
the request this time...

name: Huckle
text:
By cooperating in some way,
if heroes can build good relationships with each other,
it might lead to good results on site.

name: Huckle
text:
Besides, a small connection can become the seed of new work.
That's a common story in our industry.

name: Huckle
text:
However, at this time of year when hero shows are popular,
I wonder if there's a hero with an open schedule...

name: Melide
text:
An open schedule in summer...
And...

name: Monomasa
text:
A hero who operates mainly
on Earth...

Based on the presented conditions,
[Player] cross-referenced their mental network and database—

[Player], along with Melide and Monomasa,
narrowed down the heroes who could be requested.

And a few minutes later,
the image of a certain hero appeared almost simultaneously
in all three of their minds.

name: Melide
text:
[Player]-san.
I have someone in mind
who seems like a reliable "hero".

name: Monomasa
text:
Perhaps I'm thinking of
the same person as Melide.

The hero the three of them thought of
was the "Santa Claus" hero
whose activities are centered in winter.

name: Monomasa
text:
...It seems we have a chance.
Considering Astar's "work",
summer should be his off-season.

name: Melide
text:
Yes, Monomasa.
I think it's a good idea to consult him.

name: Melide
text:
I'm also curious about how Astar-san
has been living in this world since then...

name: Huckle
text:
...It's strange for me to say this
after consulting you, but you're
asking for something unreasonable.

name: Huckle
text:
To request cooperation from Astar-san,
who is, after all, a temporary contract hero...

name: Huckle
text:
As the head of a hero agency,
it's difficult to give an easy go-ahead...

options.text: If it's in the form of an arrangement from our company...

name: Huckle
text:
...Oh dear.
Since I've already shown you how to do it once,
I can't strongly object, can I?

name: Huckle
text:
However, it's also true that we have no other options.
Perhaps it's necessary to make a judgment that
accepts both good and bad.

name: Huckle
text:
...Alright, [Player]-kun.
If you recommend him that strongly,
I'll leave contacting Astar-san to you.

name: Huckle
text:
I'll prepare the documents.
It seems something a bit special will be needed.

Huckle, with a troubled yet somehow
happy smile—

Patted [Player]'s shoulder,
then returned to his desk
and began administrative work.

And [Player], watched by Melide and Monomasa,
contacted Astar.

name: Astar
text:
—Ngh!?
Th-that voice!?
Could it be, you!?

name: Astar
text:
D-Don't surprise me that much!
I need to prepare myself mentally; if you're going to contact me,
you should contact me about that first...

name: Astar
text:
—No, no matter what I do,
I'm going to end up surprised, aren't I!?
Astar, flustered by the sudden contact from [Player]—

Received an explanation of the request while looking agitated.
And then...

name: Monomasa
text:
—So, to put the content of this request in a nutshell,
it's about village revitalization.

name: Melide
text:
I'd be very happy if you'd accept it...
How about it, Astar-san?

name: Astar
text:
I generally understand the request.
Indeed, I'm in my off-season now.
Hmm, yes...

options.text: (Now that I think about it, will he accept it?)

text:
Astar, who seemed to be deep in thought,
nodded slightly after a while.

name: Astar
text:
—Alright.
I'll accept it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you scoundrel!
To say such a thing after making the request yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you scoundrel!
To say such a thing after making the request yourself!

text:
Immediately after the conversation settled down,
Astar muttered something.

name: Astar
text:
...The cost of living in
this world is too high.

That sudden murmur
brought a moment of silence to the office.

name: Melide
text:
...Huh?
Astar-san, what did you just say...?

name: Monomasa
text:
If I heard correctly,
I think he said "cost of living".

name: Astar
text:
Yes, I certainly said cost of living.
Don't make me repeat myself, Monomasa.

name: Astar
text:
—Let me tell you something,
compared to the world I used to live in,
the cost of living here is too high!

name: Astar
text:
However, to continue being "Santa Claus",
and to make a living here,
funds are absolutely essential!

name: Astar
text:
And, earning money
is very difficult!!

note: His face sprite is so big the "darken sprite" trick just covers up the whole thing TwT

name: Astar
text:
When I came to this world,
I lost most of my money.

name: Astar
text:
Of course,
that's not the only reason I need money.
That night when we performed a miracle together—

name: Astar
text:
To fix the "sleigh" that broke then,
several expensive parts are needed.

name: Astar
text:
However, even if I gather the parts,
I probably won't be able to fix it
back to its original form completely...

name: Monomasa
text:
...Indeed,
Astar's "sleigh" used
extraordinarily advanced technology.

name: Melide
text:
If you try to repair it,
it's natural that a corresponding price
would be required.

name: Astar
text:
That's how it is. However,
selling wood carvings, which I do sparingly,
won't be enough to cover it.

name: Astar
text:
In that case, there's no way I can just let
a job offer like this slip by.

Astar paused there and
muttered in a very small voice.

name: Astar
text:
Most of all,
from none other than "you"...

name: Astar
text: ...No, it's nothing.

name: Astar
text:
I'll accept this request.
I'm counting on you, [Player].

Thus, [Player] accepted the request
along with Astar, and
began preparing for their business trip.
Chapter 1 - Welcome to Enoshima!

A passenger-cargo "railway" line that departs from Orient City,
passes over the sea south of the Izu Peninsula and South Kanto,
and reaches the Boso Peninsula.

Riding on the levitation-type train called "EnoRail",
[Player] and Astar arrived on Enoshima.

name: Astar
text:
...A train that runs on the sea, huh?
Even though it's my first time riding it,
it felt strangely familiar.

options.text: It was quite a fresh sensation!
Amazing technology just casually appears, huh?
It felt like your sleigh, Astar.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Indeed.
Perhaps in terms of mechanism, there might be commonalities.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, unlike Nico, I'm not well-versed in that field.
So I don't know the details.

text:
Getting off the train,
[Player] and Astar exchanged words
while basking in the sea breeze.

Then, a certain person
disembarked a little later.

name: Yohack
text:
Whoa, whoa, if it isn't you, [Player]-san!
You were on the same train!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
I also accepted a request from Enoshima, and came all the way to Earth after a long time!

options.text: Yohack-san, are you also on a request?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
I also accepted a request from Enoshima, and came all the way to Earth after a long time!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
If you're that happy,
I'm a little embarrassed, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm also incredibly happy
to work with [Player]-san again!

name: Yohack
text:
I heard that a Japanese Operator would be coming,
but to think it was you!

After exchanging greetings,
Yohack also spoke to Astar,
who was standing next to [Player].

name: Yohack
text:
And then, um,
is the person next to you also a hero?

name: Yohack
text:
I'm Yohack!
I usually work as a locksmith and hero
in Estevolta of Muirauka IV!

name: Astar
text:
...I'm Astar.
I also accepted this request
as a hero.

name: Astar
text:
Although it's different from my usual "work",
I intend to fulfill the role I've been given.

options.text: You don't usually accept requests, do you?
Is this perhaps your first time?

name: Astar
text:
It's not completely my first time, but
it's certainly true that I'm not experienced.
...I can't deny that.

name: Yohack
text:
In that case,
if you have any questions,
feel free to ask!

name: Yohack
text:
I wouldn't say I'm very experienced,
but I've accepted quite a few different jobs,
so I'm sure I can be of help!

Seeing Yohack's bright smile,
Astar's expression softened slightly.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
A bright and calm voice, and
a gentle expression brimming with goodness—

name: Astar
text:
He seems to have a lot of potential.
Like an unpolished gem that will shine if polished.
If I train him now, by winter...

options.text: He's already got his eye on him!?
Hey, hey, don't judge him without permission.

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san...!
Is it okay to interpret that as a compliment!?

After exchanging greetings,
Yohack checked the time on his device.

name: Yohack
text:
...Speaking of which,
it's almost meeting time.

name: Yohack
text:
The client isn't here yet, but
is this the right meeting place?

name: Astar
text:
It should be correct.
Meeting at Enoshima Station at this time.
That's certainly what the contact said.

As [Player] and the others
confirmed the time and place,
they heard hurried footsteps approaching.

name: Friendly Office Staff?
text:
Astar-kun and Yohack-kun,
and [Player]-kun!
I'm very sorry for being late!

The owner of the footsteps,
as soon as he arrived at the meeting place,
bowed deeply and said so.

name: Yohack
text:
No, no! We just
arrived ourselves, so
you don't have to worry!

name: Astar
text:
...It seems that
you are our client.

name: Saotome
text:
...Oops, sorry, sorry.
I'm a bit late to introduce myself, but
I'm Saotome from the Enoshima Village Office.

name: Saotome
text:
The villagers call me
"Saotome-san from the office", so
please call me that!

options.text: The islanders seem to rely on you a lot!
It's nice to see how relaxed you are...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
To say such words
to an old man like me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even if my head knows it's flattery,
it doesn't feel bad at all!

name: Saotome
text:
And, to reiterate,
welcome to Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
Even though it was a sudden request this time,
thank you so much for accepting it!

name: Saotome
text:
It must have been quite a journey to get here, right?
After all, there are no other means of transportation
than EnoRail.

name: Astar
text:
Don't worry.
I haven't trained so softly
as to get tired from this much travel.

name: Yohack
text:
The journey was fun too!
Even though we were moving on the sea, it was fresh
to experience a different ride than a ship!

name: Astar
text:
Rather, aren't you the one who's tired?
You still seem out of breath...

name: Yohack
text:
It seems you ran here,
so perhaps there was some trouble
on the way here...?

name: Saotome
text:
Not only did I make guests wait,
but I'm also making them worry...

name: Saotome
text:
...To tell you the truth,
on the way here, I saw some children fighting,
and I had to calm them down a bit!

name: Saotome
text:
Both of them are usually kind kids, but
today, for some reason, they were in a bad mood.

name: Saotome
text:
So, after making sure they made up,
I hurried here!

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
If they made up, that's good.

Receiving Astar's words,
the "client" scratched the back of his head again.

name: Saotome
text:
...Well then,
let's head to the village office right away!

name: Saotome
text:
Sorry for the trouble, but
there are various procedures needed!

name: Saotome
text:
On the way, I'll give you a tour
and explain the request again!

Nodding to Saotome, who said so,
[Player] and the others
left Enoshima Station.

name: Saotome
text:
Ah, it's been a long time
since we've had visitors from outside the island!

name: Saotome
text:
I might get carried away and
chatter a lot, but
please overlook it, I mean no harm!

name: Astar
text:
...You'd say that yourself?
You have quite a good personality.

name: Yohack
text:
Astar-san!?
Aren't your words a bit strong!?

name: Saotome
text:
No, no!
Rather, I find it easier to talk
with someone that frank!

name: Yohack
text:
...Understood!
Saotome-san, if you said so,
I'll also talk freely!

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san,
I want to hear not only about the request,
but also various things about Enoshima!

Engaging in such a conversation,
[Player] and the others
proceeded through Enoshima Village.

name: Saotome
text:
Hey, [Player]-kun.
It's a bit soon to ask since you just arrived, but
do you like Enoshima?

options.text: It's nice with lots of nature!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ohh~!
You understand Enoshima's charm!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
As expected of [Player]-kun, you seem to have an eye for islands!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
An eye for islands...?
Well, I can somewhat understand what you're trying to say, but...

options.text: It's a village with a certain charm, I guess.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ohh~!
You understand Enoshima's charm!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
As expected of [Player]-kun, you seem to have an eye for islands!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
An eye for islands...?
Well, I can somewhat understand what you're trying to say, but...

options.text: It's a bit desolate, isn't it...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san!?
That, I think, is probably something you shouldn't say even if you think about it that way!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, Yohack-kun.
I think [Player]-kun's impression is quite valid.

text:
Saotome, lowering his voice slightly,
muttered words while gazing into the distance of the village.

name: Saotome
text:
...It used to prosper with people gathering
around the observation base, but
now there's no trace of that.

name: Saotome
text:
Back then, both children and adults
were filled with hope for the future.
It was truly a good village.

name: Saotome
text:
But recently,
I feel like a rather unpleasant atmosphere
has enveloped the village.

Saotome, who paused there, then
declared in a strong voice while clenching his fist.

name: Saotome
text:
That's why I, along with everyone on the island,
launched this crowdfunding project!

name: Saotome
text:
By borrowing the power of the "local heroes"
gathered from all over the universe,
we'll liven up this island once again!

name: Saotome
text:
If we do that, both children and adults
will be able to live each day
with brighter and happier feelings than now!

name: Saotome
text:
...Hmm.
It's difficult when asked again, but
a local hero is a local hero, you know.

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun is Estevolta's,
and Astar-kun is Earth's local hero,
protecting their respective regions, aren't they?

name: Astar
text:
...Indeed,
I do sometimes defeat monsters
that appear nearby.

name: Yohack
text:
That's true, but
we don't claim to be local heroes
and operate as such...

name: Yohack
text:
Like this time,
I also work on planets other than Muirauka IV.

name: Saotome
text:
No, no, that's more than enough!
Everyone in the region must be
getting courage from you all!

name: Saotome
text:
And this time,
I definitely want you to exert that power
for Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
I want everyone living in Enoshima
to feel a brighter future!

name: Astar
text:
...I understand your wish.
I don't know what I can do yet, but
I will cooperate.

name: Yohack
text:
Of course, I'll help with all my might too!
I can't just leave Saotome-san,
who's trying his best for the islanders!

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you, everyone!
I'm glad it was you all
who came to Enoshima!

—It was then.
A high-pitched scream interrupted
Saotome's words of gratitude.

name: Astar
text:
That scream must have been from a child.
Let's go help, [Player]!

name: Yohack
text:
Right...!
The voice came from this direction!
It shouldn't be far!

options.text: We have to defeat them first!
We have to protect Enoshima's children!

text:
[Player], accompanied by
Astar and Yohack,
ran in the direction of the scream.

At the place they arrived,
children were surrounded by multiple monsters.

name: Island Kid
text:
Whoa...!
Monsters appeared...!

name: Island Kid
text:
Is it because we've been fighting so much,
that we're getting punished...?

name: Island Kid
text:
Don't worry so much!
We have an absolutely invincible hero
with us!

name: Island Kid
text: Let's call him on the count of three!

name: Island Kid
text: —Help us, Enoshiman!!

name: Saotome
text:
Haa... haa...!
[Player]-kun, you are just
as fast as a hero...!

options.text: I was trained on the job.

text:
Saotome, who arrived at the scene a little late,
explained while breathing heavily.

name: Saotome
text:
Y-you'll see if you watch...!
Enoshiman is the only one on this island—

Hah-hah-hah!
Responding to the voices of the children who call my name,
the local hero who protects Enoshima—

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Enoshiman,
has arrived!!

With a resounding declaration,
a hero in a suit
appeared dashingly from nowhere.

name: Island Kid
text:
Yay!
You came!
Enoshiman!

name: Island Kid
text:
Beat those monsters
with an Enoshiman Kick!

As if their fear from earlier was a lie,
the children cheered energetically.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you!
I have surely received your words of praise!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
You too, have immediately become an Enoshiman fan!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-san, aren't you adapting incredibly fast!?

name: Enoshiman
text:
Now, it's time for battle, you monsters!
Those who harm the people of Enoshima,
this Enoshiman will not forgive!

name: Astar
text:
...Though I'm still against the thought
to reveal this form during the complete off-season,

name: Astar
text:
[Player]. Let's join in.
...Saotome, please step back.

name: Saotome
text:
...Understood.
Sorry for the trouble right after you arrived on the island,
but I'm counting on you with the children!

name: Yohack
text:
Don't worry!
Saotome-san and the children,
we'll protect them as best as we can!

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san!
Please handle the operation!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Briefing complete, it seems!
Now, let's begin the hot battle!
—Here we go!!
Battle Start

name: Astar
text:
That's enough of your mischief!
Hmph!!

name: Yohack
text:
How about this key!
—Here I come!

Astar and Yohack's blows
pierced the cores of the respective monsters.

And the last monster
opened its large mouth and entered attack stance.

name: Astar
text:
We've dealt with this one,
but there's still one left.

name: Yohack
text:
Enoshiman-san!
The monster is heading your way!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Understood!
Leave the finishing blow to me!
Special Move—

name: Enoshiman
text: Enoshiman Blade!!

The powerful hand chop unleashed with the skill name
cut the monsters in half.

name: Monster
text:
Guh...!
Gigigii...!

The monsters, its core crushed,
disappeared into the void as particles of light.

The heroes, protecting the children,
checked their surroundings and confirmed
that all monsters had been annihilated.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Thank you for your cooperation!
Yohack-kun, Astar-kun,
and you too, [Player]-kun!

options.text: H-How do you know my name...?

name: Enoshiman
text:
First, Astar-kun!
A powerful blow made possible by
your well-trained body...!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Truly splendid!
Worthy of respect!

name: Astar
text: ...I-I see.

name: Enoshiman
text:
And Yohack-kun!
Exquisite support that reaches the itchy spots,
taking into account your comrades' movements!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Extremely reassuring!
Thank you!

name: Yohack
text:
You're welcome!
Enoshiman-san, you also moved incredibly well!

name: Enoshiman
text:
And, [Player]-kun!
You skillfully led an impromptu team
with calm and precise instructions!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I am honored by your praise!
Thank you, [Player]-kun!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Everyone, your abilities were truly wonderful!
I am proud to have fought alongside
heroes like you!

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Well then, until we meet again!
Hah-hah-hah-hah!!

name: Island Kid
text:
Enoshiman!
Thank you for helping us!

name: Island Kid
text:
Your teamwork with the heroes
was so cool!

Enoshiman, with the children's cheers at his back,
left the scene with a loud laugh.

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone, thank you for fighting
alongside Enoshiman...

name: Saotome
text:
And most of all,
thank you for protecting the children!

name: Yohack
text:
You're welcome!
We were helped by Enoshiman-san too!

name: Astar
text:
Enoshiman, huh...
[Player], Yohack.
How did you feel about him?

options.text: His movements were completely those of a strong person...

name: Yohack
text:
I was surprised when he suddenly
appeared from the sky,
but he was incredibly strong!

name: Yohack
text:
Being able to perform like that while fighting monsters
is only possible because of his true ability—

name: Yohack
text: —That's what I felt.

name: Astar
text:
...I agree.
His athletic performance
was extraordinary.

name: Astar
text:
To protect this island alone,
that level of strength is essential.
Perhaps that's how it is.

His comical demeanor,
and his showy performance like a show.
And, his undeniable true ability.

The group left behind evaluated Enoshiman,
who had left like a storm, in that way.

—Who exactly was he?
Engaging in such a conversation,
the group began to walk through summer Enoshima.
